short_summary: Department requires team of 2 project specialists to support delivery of real property capital projects.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Real Property Capital Project Delivery Services**
=============================================

### Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: cb-6556-24485967
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: 24-242568 
* **Publication Date**: 2023-06-19
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-07-24T14:00:00 (Expired)
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-07-24

### Project Brief

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) requires the services of a team of two (2) project specialists with experience in the management and administration of real property to support the delivery of capital projects. The team will provide expertise and critical support in the definition of real property program needs and will assist in the research, identification and documentation of technical requirements and capabilities to support the preparation, posting and evaluation of one or more Requests for Proposal (RFP’s) for the procurement of a wide range of services in support of project delivery.

The services procured may include property management, project delivery, project management, architectural and engineering services and construction of international real property assets for which the Government of Canada is custodian or in which it is a primary tenant. Work includes engaging the providers and purchasers of real property services in select international jurisdictions, providing support for the development of Statements of Work, Performance Measures, Terms of Payment and Quality Monitoring requirements that typically form part of RFP’s for real property services, conducting technical evaluation(s) and assisting in the development of Government of Canada capacity to manage the subsequent transition and contract initiation activities associated with the resulting contractual arrangements.

### Notice Typology

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Notice Sub-Category**: Competitive – Selective Tendering

### Selection Criteria

* The evaluation will be based on a combined rating of Technical Merit and Price.

### Trade Agreements

The tender is valid for contractors who have entered into the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union
